RtcConnector::RtcConnector ( )[explicit]
Realtime clock IC handler for Core2.
Acts as a backup provider of realtime when no GNSS date-time available. The BM8563 (a.k.a. PCF8563) RTC is only present on the M5Stack Core2. Based on BM8563_Get.ino example in the library
